content: add a little luxury to your everyday with these **reversible textured** face cloths / washcloths / dishcloths knit in **oblique rib stitch** a **4 row pattern repeat** which makes **diagonal stripes** most of the cloth is knit in easy **2x2 rib** includes instructions for adding an **optional hanging loop** at the end knit with i-cord cast on 46 stitches with worsted/aran cotton for an **11 inch square** cloth but you can add or substract a multiple of 4 to **make any size** to make a lighter cloth you could use dk cotton with 3-3 5mm needles or 4 ply with 2 5-3mm needles gauge is not important but i d suggest using a needle size a bit smaller than usual to knit a dense fabric for your cloth
